records.name: Acknowledgement
records.description: Record representing the subscription-denial / content-distribution acknowledgement

fields.name: headers
fields.description: request headers retrieve from the original `http:Request`

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: content-type header value of the original `http:Request`

fields.name: content
fields.description: received content

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for configure the underlying HTTP listener of the WebSub listener.

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: value for the hub.mode parameter

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: value for the hub.topic parameter

fields.name: hubChallenge
fields.description: value for the hub.challenge parameter

fields.name: hubLeaseSeconds
fields.description: value for the hub.lease_seconds parameter

fields.name: hubReason
fields.description: value for the hub.reason parameter

records.name: RequestQueryParams
records.description: Record representing the query-parameters retrieved from the `http:Request`

fields.name: target
fields.description:
The `string` resource URL for which discovery will be initiated to identify the hub and topic,
or a tuple `[hub, topic]` representing a discovered hub and a topic

fields.name: leaseSeconds
fields.description: The period for which the subscription is expected to be active

fields.name: callback
fields.description: The callback URL for subscriber-service

fields.name: secret
fields.description: The secret to be used for authenticated content distribution

fields.name: httpConfig
fields.description: The configuration for the hub client used to interact with the discovered/specified hub

fields.name: discoveryConfig
fields.description: HTTP client configurations for resource discovery

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic for which the subscription/unsubscription request is sent

fields.name: callback
fields.description: The callback which should be registered/unregistered for the subscription/unsubscription request sent

fields.name: leaseSeconds
fields.description: The lease period for which the subscription is expected to be active

fields.name: secret
fields.description: The secret to be used for authenticated content distribution with this subscription

records.name: SubscriptionChangeRequest
records.description: Record representing a WebSub subscription change request-body.

fields.name: hub
fields.description: The hub at which the subscription/unsubscription was successful

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic for which the subscription/unsubscription was successful

fields.name: response
fields.description: The response from the hub to the subscription/unsubscription request

records.name: SubscriptionChangeResponse
records.description: Record representing subscription/unsubscription details if a subscription/unsubscription request is successful.

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: current hub.mode parameter (subscribe / unsubscribe)

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: topic URL

fields.name: hubChallenge
fields.description: hub.challenge parameter used for verification

fields.name: hubLeaseSeconds
fields.description: hub.lease_seconds parameter used to validate the expiration of subscription

records.name: SubscriptionVerification
records.description: Record representing the subscription / unsubscription intent verification request-body.

records.name: SubscriptionVerificationSuccess
records.description: Record representing the subscription / unsubscription intent verification success.

parameters.name: expectedMediaTypes
parameters.description: The expected media types for the subscriber client

parameters.name: expectedLanguageTypes
parameters.description: The expected language types for the subscriber client

returnParameters.description: A `(hub, topic)` as a `(string, string)` if successful or else an `error` if not

remoteMethods.name: discoverResourceUrls
remoteMethods.description: Discovers the hub and topic URLs defined by a resource URL.

clients.name: DiscoveryService
clients.description: Represents resource-discovery service which identify the `hub` and `topic` from `resource-URL`.

parameters.name: subscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The `SubscriptionChangeRequest` containing the subscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating subscription details if the request was successful
or else an `error` if an error occurred with the subscription request

remoteMethods.name: subscribe
remoteMethods.description:
Sends a subscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse|error response = websubHubClientEP->subscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: unsubscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The `SubscriptionChangeRequest` containing unsubscription details

returnParameters.description:
An unsubscription details if the request was successful or else an `error` if an error occurred
with the unsubscription request

remoteMethods.name: unsubscribe
remoteMethods.description:
Sends an unsubscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse|error response = websubHubClientEP->unsubscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL at which the subscription should be changed

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `http:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or `()`

parameters.name: subscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The `SubscriptionChangeRequest` containing the subscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating subscription details if the request was successful
or else an `error` if an error occurred with the subscription request

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description:
Sends a subscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse|error response = websubHubClientEP->subscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: unsubscriptionRequest

returnParameters.description:
An unsubscription details if the request was successful or else an `error` if an error occurred
with the unsubscription request

methods.name: unsubscribe
methods.description:
Sends an unsubscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse|error response = websubHubClientEP->unsubscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the service

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: `websub:ListenerConfiguration` to be provided to underlying HTTP Listener

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `websub:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: `SubscriberServiceConfiguration` which should be incorporated into the provided Service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

methods.name: attachWithConfig
methods.description: Setup the provided Service with given configurations and attaches it to the listener

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches the provided Service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

listeners.name: Listener

annotations.name: SubscriberServiceConfig
annotations.description: WebSub Subscriber Configuration for the service, indicating subscription related parameters.

packages.name: websub
packages.summary: This package contains an implementation of the W3C "WebSub" (https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/) recommendation, which facilitates a push-based content delivery/notification mechanism between publishers and subscribers.
